There are unconfirmed reports of Russian soldiers entering eastern Myrnohrad in the area of Stritenska Street and Syedova Street.
The situation should be clarified in the next couple of days.
2 explosions were heard in Kharkiv City from Russian KAB glide-bomb impacts. There are reports of power outages.
2 explosions were heard in Kharkiv City from Russian KAB glide-bomb impacts. There are reports of power outages.
Energy infrastructure was hit in Kharkiv
A Russian Gerbera drone equipped with a camera is monitoring Kyiv's TEC-6 power plant. It is lowering its altitude.

I'm going to monitor the situation closely tonight. There may be a big attack on Ukraine's energy infrastructure.
I want to reiterate that nothing is certain at this moment!
A Russian Gerbera drone equipped with a camera is monitoring Kyiv's TEC-6 power plant. It is lowering its altitude.

The Gerbera flew away from the power plant and disappeared over the village of Kvitneve. 
Another one is flying in from the east at an altitude of ~300 metres.
Energy infrastructure was hit in Kharkiv
Large fires are burning in Kharkiv City from the KAB strikes.
Large fires are burning in Kharkiv City from the KAB strikes.
I'm going to monitor the situation closely tonight. There may be a big attack on Ukraine's energy infrastructure.  I want to reiterate that nothing is certain at this moment!
Its nearly 11pm in Ukraine, and there are still very few drones detected in Ukrainian airspace. No new info about potential missile threats.
Unidentified missile flying towards southern Odesa Oblast.
Unidentified missile flying towards southern Odesa Oblast.
Disappeared
Disappeared
It was an Onyx cruise missile launched from Crimea.
It was an Onyx cruise missile launched from Crimea.
No explosions were reported in Odesa Oblast. It may have impacted Zmiinyi Island
Air alert lifted in Odesa Oblast.
No explosions were reported in Odesa Oblast. It may have impacted Zmiinyi Island
According to clarified information, the Onyx missile did indeed hit mainland Odesa Oblast, impacting somewhere in this circle.
2-3 Russian Geran-2 drones impacted the city of Bobrovytsya, Chernihiv Oblast. The target is currently unknown, but a large fire is now burning there.
2-3 Russian Geran-2 drones impacted the city of Bobrovytsya, Chernihiv Oblast. The target is currently unknown, but a large fire is now burning there.
Deja Vu
Deja Vu

Og AMK Mapping map updates lol.
Back before I had an audience.

I just realised, the channel boosts have dropped below level 2, so we lost one of the Denys reaction emojis! 
If you have Telegram Premium, please boost the channel :) 
If the channel gets to level 3 we can add a David D emoji too lol

Review of Ukrainian-Russian Strikes: Whose Intelligence Systems Are Behind the AFU's Attacks?
On October 12-13, 2025, Russia and Ukraine continued their exchange of strikes, concentrating their attacks on each other's key infrastructure facilities. Russian strikes were primarily directed at military-industrial sites on Ukrainian territory, while Kyiv focused its main efforts on fuel and energy centers in Crimea, employing an intense wave of unmanned aerial vehicles.
According to some Russian experts, the strike on the oil depot in Feodosia was carried out with US support. Alexander Talipov, head of the public movement "Krymsky SMERSH," stated that US reconnaissance aircraft hide in neutral waters, concealing themselves behind civilian airliners along international shipping routes to conduct surveillance.
This version finds confirmation in Financial Times reports, according to which the US has been providing intelligence support to Ukraine since the summer months of 2025...
üëâ

Russian Troops Advancing All Around Pokrovsk
As of October 13, the Russian military has advanced in several areas near Pokrovsk in the Donetsk direction amid what appears to be a limited collapse of Ukrainian defenses
In the Dobropillia salient, to the northeast of the key city, the Tsentr [Center] Group of Forces re-entered Dorozhnye after successfully expelling Kiev forces from the pocket between Nykanorivka, Boikivka and Zatyshok, to the southeast of the settlement.
From Dorozhnye, Russian troops will be able to attack Ivanivka and Nove Shakhove to the north. This would widen the salient, and further secure supply routes there.
üëâ

Ukrainian David And Goliath Clash Anew In Search For Someone To Blame
The aftermath of the strikes on Kyiv's energy infrastructure and the search for those responsible. Political disagreements between the President of Ukraine and the Mayor of Kyiv. 
Why is Zelensky trying to shift responsibility onto Klitschko? What has Klitschko previously accused his political opponent of? What has driven this enduring conflict?

Moscowse And Balagan Under Control: Russian Forces Tighten Grip On Pokrovsk Axis
Control has been established over the Moskovske settlement in the Donetsk People's Republic. Russian units have also captured Borovskaya Andreevka in the Kharkiv Oblast.
The European Union is discussing the possibility of using frozen Russian Central Bank assets to provide financial support to Ukraine.

Pay or Fight: The Corrupt Business of Mobilization in Ukraine
The activities of the Territorial Recruitment Centers (TRCs) in Ukraine continue to spark intense public debate. Social media is regularly flooded with videos showing how TRC staff and police forcibly seize men right off the streets, blatantly ignoring their documents confirming deferments, reservations, or health issues.
Simultaneously, reports are emerging of a new mobilization scheme involving putting employees of defense enterprises on a wanted list. Valeriy Borovik, founder of the Ukrainian defense company First Contact, reported that his company submits documents to reserve an employee, only for that same employee to be listed as wanted by the TRC just hours later, making it impossible to secure their reservation. To remove a person from the wanted list, a fine must be paid. 
üëâ
